name: BoB (Bountiful or Barren)
description:
BoB (Bountiful or Barren) is 8-bit adventure TTRPG that aims to encourage exploration on a limitless field. A hack of Beak, Feather, & Bone by Tyler Crumrine using the BFB SRD. BoB features a GM-less style of gameplay where players (2+) create their own worlds to explore. All outcomes of events and instances will be decided through a d6 die for gameplay simplicity, and the use of an interactive map labeling system. The game map takes place on chess boards, inviting the use of digital and physical means of play. Tiles will represent different planets, created by the players themselves that discover them.

BoB is centred around an “every man for themselves” space mission where the story emphasizes the need for our characters to be selfish and cunning, in order to benefit their own motivations. The details are up to the players, while the framework of the game objectives are laid up. Optional prompts are also provided for new players, to help ease the stress of story improvisation.
